cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16)

function(download_file url filename hash_type hash)
    if(NOT EXISTS ${filename})
        file(DOWNLOAD ${url} ${filename}
            TIMEOUT 60
            EXPECTED_HASH ${hash_type}=${hash}
            TLS_VERIFY ON)
    endif()
endfunction(download_file)
